Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Prominently situated in Lake City at the entrance to Lake City Business Centre in North Burnaby, 3400 Lake City Way is a corner property that benefits from direct rapid transit access at the Lake City Way Millennium Skytrain station and can be easily accessed via BC Highway 7 (Lougheed Highway) and Highway 1 (Trans-Canada Highway) among other major arterial routes. The site’s exposure along Lake City Way, Lougheed Highway, and Enterprise Street offer multiple road frontages and access points to the property. Lake City is a major employment hub servicing high-density urban centres such as Brentwood Town Centre and The City of Lougheed, among other areas of Burnaby and Metro Vancouver. Lake City’s close proximity to Simon Fraser University and the British Columbia Institute of Technology allows businesses in the area to tap into a vast network of research & development programs and graduate talent. The area has long been home to a number of leading local and multi-national businesses such as: Canadian Red Cross, Global BC, Norco Studios,Golden Boy Foods, K-Bro Linen Systems, ALS Environmental, Mammoth Studios, Canadian Freightways, Traction on Demand, and William F. White International.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE | 24,435 SF FLEX INDUSTRIAL AND OFFICE SPACE LOCATED ADJACENT TO LAKE CITY WAY SKYTRAIN STATION

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Nestled along Roy Street in the well-established Still Creek industrial area of Burnaby, BC, 5595 Roy Street offers up to 12,487 SF of industrial space over two floors. The property provides excellent transportation access to Lougheed Highway and the Trans-Canada Highway connecting to all of Metro Vancouver. Located only a 10-minute walk from Holdom Station, the property is surrounded by an abundance of amenities and is located 7-minutes by drive to the newly built Amazing Brentwood and booming Brentwood area.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE | FREESTANDING INDUSTRIAL / OFFICE BUILDING IN BURNABY

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 7532 Conway Avenue is nestled in the Beresford industrial area of Burnaby, BC, surrounded by an abundance of amenities in the nearby Kingsway area and offers excellent transit access to the Millennium SkyTrain Line connecting to all of Metro Vancouver. The property is strategically located within 5-minutes by drive to Highgate Village Shopping Centre to the East and Royal Oak SkyTrain Station to the West, and is within walking distance to Edmonds SkyTrain Station.

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Executive vice President

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Subject building is located in the  Big Bend industrial area
Subject building is located in the  Big Bend industrial area

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
7440 Fraser Park Drive is primely situated in the heart of the Big
Bend industrial area of South Burnaby. This location provides direct
access to all parts of the Lower Mainland, via Boundary Road and
Marine Way. The location is transit friendly with the new 116 bus route
providing connection to Metrotown SkyTrain Station (4 km away) and
Edmonds SkyTrain Station (7 km away). The building is directly across
from Fraser Foreshore Trail. It is easily accessible to food, shopping,
and amenities with Marine Way Market, Big Bend Crossing, and
Riverway Golf Course a quick 5-minute drive away

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE | WAREHOUSE & UPGRADED OFFICE SPACE ALONG THE FRASER RIVER
